name: Sanada Yukimura
skill: Deals 1773/2113 to the row of enemies directly in front. Target deals 30%/36% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: All melee allies take moderately less DMG.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a general considered the best warrior in Japan. He became famous for putting his life on the line for the Toyotomi family he served, and he hasn't changed at all since becoming a spirit. Many spirits wish they could be like him, marching in alone and carving a path to success even when the chances of victory look slim. Currently he appears to be deeply indebted to Mikado... It's not clear why, but in any case he's not in any position to stand up to her.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 01/06/17 - 31/07/17
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "Can you handle the famous Sanada resolve?"
skill: "I'll show you the might of Sanada Rokumonsen."
